titleStmt.title: The pastors advocate. Together with the peoples monitor. By R. Junius Gent. Adde this as an appendix to Gods goodnesse and Englands unthankfulnesse. Imprimatur, Tho. Gataker.
Englands unthankfulness striving with Gods goodness, for the victory. Appendix.
titleStmt.author: Younge, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Abraham Miller and are to be sold by James Crump in Little Bartholmewes Well-yard],

notesStmt.note: Intended as an appendix to Younge's Englands unthankfulness striving with Gods goodness, for the victory.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
